title.narrative: Grantley Adams International Airport Pavement Rehabilitation and Expansion Project

description.narrative: The purpose for which the Loan is being made is to assist in financing rehabilitation of the runway, taxiways and aprons, associated electrical works and retrofitting pavement lighting to LED fixtures; landside pavement rehabilitation and expansion works; and perimeter fencing reconstruction; consulting services for the design and construction supervision of the works; airfield lighting equipment and car park electric vehicle charging equipment; consulting services to develop (i) an FBO policy and guidelines, and (ii) a sustainability management plan for GAIA; and services to manage implementation of the Project, including auditing of the Designated Account (the Project)
